Configuration filesÂ¶

The directory /apercal/modules contains some standard configurations files. The automated pipeline uses default.cfg. They can be copied and adjusted for manual processing

Contents:

  • Default configuration files
  • Configuration: 150-MHz pipeline
  • (Inactive) Configuration: 300-MHz pipeline
  • (Inactive) Configuration: Quicklook pipeline
  • Configuration: SVC reprocessing
